sentences.en: Chapter 3 is entitled as case analysis of capital adequacy supervision.
sentences.cn: 第三章为资本充足法律监管的个案分析与借鉴.

sentences.en: He doubted her adequacy for the job.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑她能否胜任这项工作.

sentences.en: I am very critical of the adequacy of Britain's race laws.
sentences.cn: 我对英国种族法律的适当性颇有微词。

sentences.en: Improve the commercial bank's capital adequacy ratio requirement was necessary.
sentences.cn: 提高商业银行资本充足率的要求非常必要.

sentences.en: It also urged regulators to better assess the adequacy of bank capital.
sentences.cn: 监管机构要更准确地评估银行资本充足水平.

sentences.en: Maintain and manage adequacy supplier and price data in system.
sentences.cn: 维护及管理系统内供应商及价格等数据资料.

sentences.en: No true fiasco ever began as a quest fore mere adequacy.
sentences.cn: 探寻的道路上永远不会有真正的惨败.

sentences.en: Ordinarily , therefore, courts do not inquire into the adequacy of consideration.
sentences.cn: 通常, 法院因此而并不探究约因的充分性.

sentences.en: Several studies point to a real cause for concern over the adequacy of the diet eaten by British children.
sentences.cn: 针对英国儿童膳食质量的担忧，数份研究将矛头指向了同一根源。

sentences.en: The adequacy of the security arrangements has been questioned.
sentences.cn: 有人质疑安全措施是否足够.

sentences.en: The adequacy of this approximation is considered later.
sentences.cn: 这种近似方法的适用性将在后面再讨论.

sentences.en: The Basel Capital Accord sets international capital adequacy standards.
sentences.cn: 巴塞尔资本协议订立了有关资本充足率的国际标准.

sentences.en: The close agreement suggests the adequacy of the preceding theoretical equations.
sentences.cn: 由于吻合程度好,说明上述理论方程式是适用的.

sentences.en: There are questions to be raised about the adequacy of the inmates' legal representation.
sentences.cn: 关于监犯的法定代表是否够格会有一些问题被提出。

sentences.en: Therefore supplementary capital adequacy ratio of the programs also pay attention to.
sentences.cn: 因此补充资本充足率的方案也有所讲究.

sentences.en: Visual impact: adequacy of the facilities and its surroundings to protect landscape.
sentences.cn: 视觉影响: 确保拥有足够设施保护景观,且四周环境不会对景观造成影响.

trans.tran_en: Adequacy is the quality of being good enough or great enough in amount to be acceptable
